content.query:
use nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS silver.vw_trip_data_green
GO

CREATE VIEW silver.vw_trip_data_green
AS
SELECT cast (result.filepath(1) as varchar(4) as 'year'),
cast (result.filepath(2) as varchar(2) as 'month'), result.* 
FROM
    OPENROWSET
        (
            BULK 'silver/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
            FORMAT='parquet',
            DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src'
        )AS result
